ComicInfo.Summary: Three If By Space!: Maxinor brings a warning that Georwell is invading Earth. The Machine then releases the Free Force from stasis and divides the teams to conquer the threats: Maxinor, Demon, Titan, and Talisman journey to Georwell to aid the rebellion; Challenger and Diviner journey to the moon to stop Zarren and rescue their sons; and Blazer, Youthquake and the Free Force remain on earth to stop any invasion forces.
ComicInfo.Title: Three If By Space!
ComicInfo.Characters: The Free Force [Controller,Prosecutor Zarren,Havoc,the new Justice Machine [Monolith,Ramman and Ragna (Jaiime’s and Tessie’s sons),the Justice Machine [Challenger [Jaiime Conrad],Maxinor,Fist,Phaser,Crusader,Diviner [Tessei Molleng A-Conrad],Titan [Jemin Osk],Demon [Gabel Nevin];Talisman],Manslaughter,Youthquake [Robert Maxinor],Darkforce],Blazer [Mitrian Fynn],Nightowl]
